problem.p: Would you like to make use of the on-line community around this course?

choice.name: work_closely
choice.text: I would like to work closely with my fellow students and form a community.

choice.name: q_and_a
choice.text: I like having a question and answer forum and some interactions when I need help, but no deeper connections.

choice.name: not_planning_to_use_forum
choice.text: I am not planning on using the on-line discussion board.
